attributes.title: Funhaus Dungeons and Dragons - Episode 1
attributes.caption: So it begins...
attributes.description: Fisticuffs, gender-bending, mutilation, love affairs, magic, hacking, and so much drinking. It's all here in the first episode of our new Funhaus D&D adventure!

attributes.title: Funhaus Dungeons and Dragons - Episode 2
attributes.caption: So it... uh... continues.
attributes.description: In which our travelers meet a family in need, drink themselves stupid, battle a pack of wolves, and discover a strange, gruesome scene.

attributes.title: Funhaus Dungeons and Dragons - Episode 3
attributes.caption: "I'm a little suspish-ee-osis."
attributes.description: In which suspicions arise, balls are modified, a halfling is tossed, and far too much time is spent discussing the genitals of goblins.

attributes.title: Funhaus Dungeons and Dragons - Episode 4
attributes.caption: "Just... uh... cover yourselves in poop and pretend yer the poop-goblin!"
attributes.description: In which new caverns are discovered, Dirik becomes aroused, Decker remains indifferent, and many enemies are brutally and needlessly maimed.

attributes.title: Funhaus Dungeons and Dragons - Episode 5
attributes.caption: "You're definitely into that ass, right there!"
attributes.description: In which much Pakse is consumed, Shattercock disrobes, Grimo is left turgid, and Racsan reveals a shameful and potentially perilous family secret.

attributes.title: Funhaus Dungeons and Dragons - Episode 6
attributes.caption: "Are your pants still tented?"
attributes.description: In which a plan is hatched, a laptop is booted, brigands are dealt with, and Grimo's balls are left hopelessly azure.

attributes.title: Funhaus Dungeons and Dragons - Episode 7
attributes.caption: "What happens if I show him a little nipple?"
attributes.description: In which our group moves on, a muff is smelled, new friendships are forged, and a hobbled hero is left in the lurch.

attributes.title: Funhaus Dungeons and Dragons - Episode 8
attributes.caption: "We all have AIDS? Thanks."
attributes.description: In which a servant is conjured, forest spirits are freed, a disabled man becomes more so, and Shattercock cleans her lady business.

attributes.title: Funhaus Dungeons and Dragons - Episode 9
attributes.caption: "...you got the measurements of a human ladle!"
attributes.description: In which a renegotiation takes place, a skull is split, songs are sung, and Sai Te's time with our heroes comes to a merciful end.

attributes.title: Funhaus Dungeons and Dragons - Episode 10
attributes.caption: "We're about to die."
attributes.description: In which the final Moondog is met, new powers are gained, Decker's mystery deepens, and a greater evil may spell doom for our brave heroes.
